title: New: Japandroids – The House That Heaven Built
content:
For a two piece, Japandroids make one hell of a racket, and I mean that in the most complimentary way possible.

With new single The House That Heaven Built, they’ve created one of the finest tracks of the year thus far; a rifftastic sludge-rock inspired number, gyrating wildly throughout it’s five minute length. As well as dropping this new track, the Canadian two piece have also announced details of a new record, entitled Celebration Rock, out 5 June. Check out The House That Heaven Built below, and the track listing for the new record under that.

The Nights of Wine and Roses
Fire’s Highway
Evil’s Sway
For the Love of Ivy
Adrenaline Nightshift
Younger Us
The House That Heaven Built
Continuous Thunder
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
